whatIsTheBusinessNameTitle: What is the business name? welsh
whatIsTheBusinessNameHint: This is the name your business trades under. welsh
whatIsTheBusinessNamePublic: We will show this on the public register. welsh
error-whatIsTheBusinessNameInvalidCharac: Business name must only include letters a to z, and common special characters such as hyphens, spaces and apostrophes welsh
error-whatIsTheBusinessNameCharactersLim: Business name must be 200 characters or less welsh
